name: Nassau
startIntroPart2: We've secured our claim to the New World's waters and the wealth they carry.
declaringWar: Hoist the colours! Prepare to be boarded!
attacked: They'll regret crossing The Black Flag!
defeated: Curse our luck! This is only a temporary retreat!
introduction: Welcome to the fringes of uncivilization. Try not to scratch the paint.
afterPeace: The wind has changed. A temporary truce will suffice.
tradeRequest: A bargain struck on the high seas is a treasure for both of us.
